adminGuide.sectionSubtitle: Complete guide for managing your Mercadinho25 marketplace
adminGuide.recommendationTip: For the most accurate automatic translations, enter product names and descriptions in Portuguese or English.

gettingStarted.title: 1. Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: Mercadinho25 is a multi-tenant e-commerce marketplace platform designed for Brazilian artisan goods. This guide covers all administrative functions available in the Dashboard.

login.title: Logging In
steps: Navigate to your store URL (e.g., yourstore.mercadinho25.com)
Click "Login" in the top navigation bar
Enter your email and password
After login, click your profile avatar and select "Dashboard"
login.tip: Default Admin Credentials: admin@mercadinho.com.br | Password set during initial setup

roles.title: User Roles
roles.intro: The platform uses role-based access control (RBAC) with four levels:
roles.seller: Seller ‚Äî Create/manage products, view sales, manage own orders
roles.tenantAdmin: TenantAdmin ‚Äî Manage sellers, users, settings, categories, payments
roles.superAdmin: SuperAdmin ‚Äî Multi-tenant management, create tenants, system-wide access

dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
dashboard.intro: The main dashboard displays key metrics at a glance:
items: Total Products: Number of active products in your store
Total Orders: All orders with pending order count
Revenue: Total sales revenue with currency formatting
Active Sellers: Number of approved sellers in your marketplace

categories.title: Managing Categories
categories.intro: Categories organize your product catalog. Navigate to Dashboard > Products > Categories.
steps: Click "Add Category" to create a new category
Enter the category name in your current language
Check "Auto-translate" to automatically translate the name to all 8 languages
Set the category slug (URL-friendly name, auto-generated)
Optionally set a parent category for subcategories (hierarchical structure)
Toggle "Active" to control visibility
Click "Save" to create the category

translations.title: Category Translations
translations.intro: Each category name is stored in all 8 platform languages:
items: Auto-translate generates translations via Google Translate or Claude AI
The API returns localized names based on the user's interface language
You can manually override any auto-translated name
Missing translations fall back to Portuguese, then to the first available

attributes.title: Adding Attribute Types to a Category
attributes.intro: Attribute types define variant options for products (e.g., Color, Size, Material):
steps: Open the category edit modal
Scroll to "Attribute Types" section
Click "Add Attribute Type" ‚Äî select from existing or create new
When creating new: enter names in all 8 languages (with country flags), slug auto-generates
Configure Display Order (hierarchy) and Required toggle
Click the gear icon to manage values (e.g., Red, Blue, Green for Color)
Each value supports multilingual names and optional HEX color codes
Removing an attribute type deletes all related variant data ‚Äî use with caution
Click "Save" to apply
attributes.tip: The display order matters: the first attribute type becomes the top-level selector, the second becomes the next level. Values cascade ‚Äî lower levels filter based on higher-level selections.

creating.title: Creating a Product
steps: Click "Add Product"
Fill in Name, Description, Story (multilingual fields)
Set pricing: Base price, sale price (optional), currency
Upload images (drag-and-drop or file picker)
Select category and subcategory
Configure variants with individual pricing/stock
Set stock quantity and SKU
Set status: Draft, Active, or Archived
Click "Save" to publish

phoneUpload.title: Uploading Images from Phone (QR Code)
phoneUpload.intro: Upload product photos directly from your phone camera:
steps: Click "Upload from Phone" button (smartphone icon)
On desktop: scan the QR code with your phone camera
On mobile: the app redirects to the camera capture page automatically
Take photos ‚Äî they upload in real-time to the product form
A green indicator shows "Waiting for photos..." while active
Click "Done ‚Äî Add Images" when finished
phoneUpload.tip: The QR session is time-limited. Both devices must be on the same network. You can regenerate the QR code if it expires.

autoTranslate.title: Automatic Translation
autoTranslate.intro: The platform translates product names and descriptions to all supported languages:
steps: Fill in Name and Description in Portuguese or English (recommended for best accuracy)
Check the "Auto-translate" checkbox (sparkle icon ‚ú®)
On save, the system translates to all 7 other languages automatically
Uses Google Translate API or Claude AI (configured by admin)
Review and manually edit any translation after saving
autoTranslate.tip: Speech-to-text is also available: click the microphone icon next to any text field to dictate in the selected language.

variants.title: Adding Variants to a Product
variants.intro: When the selected category has attribute types, the variant section appears automatically:
steps: Select a category ‚Äî attribute types load automatically (e.g., Color, Size)
Enable each attribute type by checking its checkbox (strict hierarchical order)
Check specific values (e.g., Red, Blue under Color; S, M, L under Size)
Click a value to highlight it (green border). All highlighted = editing specific variant
Price panel switches: "Base Prices" ‚Üî "Variant Prices: Color: Red, Size: Large"
Set Price, Compare-at Price, Stock for each combination
Variants without custom prices inherit the base product price
Unchecking a value removes all related variant data automatically
variants.tip: Color attributes show swatches. Variant names auto-generate in all languages (e.g., "Red / Large"). A blue info panel shows whether you're editing base or variant prices.

bulkOps.title: Bulk Operations & Search
items: Search by product name or SKU
Filter by status (Draft, Active, Archived) and category
Bulk share to Facebook, Instagram, or Etsy
Bulk status change (activate, archive, draft)

shipments.title: Shipments
items: View all shipments with status tracking
Create shipping labels (Correios integration for Brazil)
Track packages with real-time status updates
Print labels directly from the dashboard
Statuses: Pending, Label Created, Posted, In Transit, Out for Delivery, Delivered, Returned, Lost, Cancelled

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
items: Sales Analytics: Revenue charts, order trends, top-selling products
Orders Tab: Complete history with filtering and pagination
Export data for external analysis
View metrics by date range

tenants.title: Tenant Management (SuperAdmin Only)
tenants.intro: Navigate to Dashboard > Store > Tenancy to manage multiple stores.
steps: Click "Add Tenant" to create a new marketplace
Configure: Store name, subdomain, custom domain (optional)
Set commission rate (default 10%)
Assign a Tenant Admin user
Activate/deactivate tenants as needed
tenants.tip: Subdomains and custom domains are configured automatically when creating a tenant. All DNS records are provisioned without manual intervention.

sellers.title: Seller Management
items: View all sellers with stats (products, sales, rating)
Approve or reject pending seller applications
Edit seller profiles (store name, description, location)
Toggle "Featured" status for prominent display
View Stripe Connect onboarding status
Filter by status: Pending, Approved, Suspended

users.title: User Management
items: View all registered users with their current roles
Change user roles (Customer, Seller, TenantAdmin)
Only SuperAdmin can assign SuperAdmin role
Search and filter by name, email, or role

stripe.title: Stripe Configuration
stripe.sandbox: Sandbox: Enter test API keys (pk_test_..., sk_test_...) ‚Üí Save ‚Üí Test ‚Üí Activate
stripe.production: Production: Same steps with live keys. Test thoroughly before going live. Configure webhook endpoint.
stripe.connect: Stripe Connect: Each seller completes onboarding to receive payments. The platform auto-splits payments based on commission rate.

mercadopago.title: MercadoPago
items: Enable/disable MercadoPago payments
Configure marketplace fee percentage
Set default currency (BRL)
Enable Checkout Pro for seamless flow
Supports: Credit/Debit cards, PIX, Boleto

shipping.title: Shipping (Correios)
items: Configure Correios integration for Brazilian shipping
Set shipping rates and delivery options
Enable/disable methods per region
Configure free shipping thresholds

google.title: Google Shopping
steps: Copy the generated product feed URL
Create a Google Merchant Center account
Add the feed URL in Merchant Center > Products > Feeds
Configure settings (country, language, currency)
Submit for review

etsy.title: Etsy Integration
items: Connect your Etsy shop via OAuth
Sync products with automatic listing creation
Manage Etsy orders from the dashboard
View analytics and sales data
Bulk publish products to Etsy

social.title: Social Media
items: Facebook & Instagram: Connect Business page, share products, configure Meta product feed
WhatsApp Business: Configure number per seller, enable contact button on product pages
Configure feed languages and translation priorities

branding.title: 6. Branding & Customization
items: Logo: Upload store logo (header and emails)
Favicon: Custom browser tab icon
Colors: Primary (#2E7D32), Secondary (#FFC107), Accent
Typography: Custom font family
Banner Image: Hero image for homepage
Tagline & About Text
Custom CSS for advanced styling

languages.title: 7. Language Settings
languages.intro: The platform supports 8 languages: Portuguese (primary), English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Russian.
languages.tip: Always fill in at least Portuguese and English translations for all products and categories to maximize reach. The system falls back to Portuguese if a translation is missing.
